lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, March 2 (U.P.) -- The United States has been designated the key nation in Australia's new war strategy, it was reported today, and The Sydney Telegraph urged that an American -- General Douglas MacArthur -- be named Supreme Allied Commander in the Pacific.
abstract: Sydney Telegraph urges MacArthur apptmt as Sup Allied Comdr in Pacific; Bennett on escape from Singapore
